languages.text: {n}Эфир рассыпается помехами, вновь взывает сирена, и Мастер вокса обращается к вам:{/n} "Мы наконец получили оповещение о входящей вокс-трансляции! Если прикажете — мои офицеры немедленно наладят связь с неизвестными".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эфир рассыпается помехами, вновь взывает сирена, и Мастер Вокса обращается к вам:{/n} "Мы наконец получили оповещение о входящей вокс-трансляции! Если прикажете — мои офицеры немедленно наладят связь с неизвестными".

languages.text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."
languages.original_text: {n}Эфир рассыпается помехами, вновь взывает сирена, и Мастер вокса обращается к вам:{/n} "Мы наконец получили оповещение о входящей вокс-трансляции! Если прикажете — мои офицеры немедленно наладят связь с неизвестными".

traits.locale_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

{n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

{n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

{n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

languages.text: {n}静电声传了出来，警报声再次响起。音阵大师对你开了口。{/n}“我们终于收到了对方的音阵讯息！我的军官已经准备好为您接通身份不明的对方成员。”
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

traits.locale_text: {n}静电声传了出来，警报声再次响起。音阵大师对你开了口。{/n}“我们终于收到了对方的音阵讯息！我的军官已经准备好为您接通身份不明的对方成员。”

languages.text: {n}La estática irrumpe en la línea, las sirenas vuelven a dispararse y la maestra de vocos se gira hacia ti:{/n} «¡Por fin nos han avisado de una transmisión de voco entrante! Mis oficiales están a la espera para conectarl{mf|e|a} con los desconocidos».
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

traits.locale_text: {n}La estática irrumpe en la línea, las sirenas vuelven a dispararse y la maestra de vocos se gira hacia ti:{/n} «¡Por fin nos han avisado de una transmisión de voco entrante! Mis oficiales están a la espera para conectarl{mf|e|a} con los desconocidos».

languages.text: {n}電波による雑音が通信回線から聞こえてくると、再びサイレンが鳴り響き、ヴォクス・マスターがこちらを向く。{/n}「ようやくヴォクス通信が入りました！正体不明の宇宙海賊とロード・キャプテンをお繋ぎするよう、ヴォクス・チーム待機しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

traits.locale_text: {n}電波による雑音が通信回線から聞こえてくると、再びサイレンが鳴り響き、ヴォクス・マスターがこちらを向く。{/n}「ようやくヴォクス通信が入りました！正体不明の宇宙海賊とロード・キャプテンをお繋ぎするよう、ヴォクス・チーム待機しています」

languages.text: {n}Des grésillements se font entendre, la sirène retentit à nouveau et la maîtresse-vox se tourne vers vous :{/n} « Nous recevons enfin une transmission-vox ! Mes officiers se tiennent prêts à vous connecter à l'émetteur non identifié. »
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des grésillements se font entendre, la sirène retentit à nouveau et la maîtresse-vox se tourne vers vous :{/n} « Nous recevons enfin une transmission-vox ! Mes officiers se tiennent prêts à vous connecter à l'émetteur non identifié. »

languages.text: {n}In der Leitung rauscht es, die Sirene ertönt erneut, und dann wendet sich die Voxmeisterin dir zu:{/n} "Endlich kommt eine Vox-Übertragung herein! Meine Offiziere sind in Bereitschaft, um Euch mit dem nicht identifizierten Gesprächspartner zu verbinden."
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Leitung rauscht es, die Sirene ertönt erneut, und dann wendet sich die Voxmeisterin dir zu:{/n} "Endlich kommt eine Vox-Übertragung herein! Meine Offiziere sind in Bereitschaft, um Euch mit dem nicht identifizierten Gesprächspartner zu verbinden."

languages.text: {n}Hatta parazitlenme duyuluyor, ardından siren tekrar çalıyor ve Voks Üstadı yüzünü sana dönüyor.{/n} "Nihayet, voks iletişimi için talep gönderdiler! Emri vermeniz hâlinde subaylarım, tanımlanamayan şahıslarla bağlantıyı sağlayacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Static comes over the line, the siren blares again, and the Vox Master turns to you:{/n} "We have finally been alerted to an incoming vox-transmission! My officers are standing by to connect you to the unidentified parties."
